column3: I have been dragging' around your sensitive ego
column4: Making sure that your bags arrive on time for the dog and pony show
column5: A little suitcase like a brick
column6: It kinda makes it hard to get a good grip
column7: I drop your troubles off at the conveyor belt
column8: I'll hand you a ticket to go get it yourself
column11: At the baggage claim,, you got a lot of luggage in your name
column12: When you hit the ground,, check the lost and found
column13: Cause it ain't my problem now
column14: I can't carry it on,, I've got a lot of troubles on my own
column15: It's all over the yard,, in the trunk of the car
column16: I'm packing' it in,, so come and get it
column19: If it ain't obvious what has set me off today
column20: Behind every woman scorned is a man who made her that way
column21: Go on and take your little business trip
column22: With that sweet little habit that you can't kick
column23: You better call your momma when you get to town
column24: Cause I ain't gonna be hanging' around
column32: Come and pick it up,, pick it up
column33: Before I blow it up in flames
column34: You better pick it up,, pick it up
